snippet: The Roman Catholic Church in Sri Lanka accused the military on Wednesday of shooting unarmed protesters last week and desecrating a church.
abstract: Roman Catholic Church in Sri Lanka accuses military of shooting unarmed protesters and desecrating church by entering it with weapons and attacking people who sought refuge there.
lead_paragraph: The Roman Catholic Church in Sri Lanka accused the military on Wednesday of shooting unarmed protesters last week and desecrating a church.

headline.main: Sri Lanka: Catholic Church Says Army Killed Unarmed Protesters
headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka: Catholic Church Says Army Killed Unarmed Protesters
